DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate improvement symptom Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) accord Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) Quality- of- Life ( QoL ) index add- therapy Umooze twice daily administration 56 day patient BPH .
DOC.brief_title: Research Benefit Umooze Add- Therapy Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.detailed_description: The study product , Umooze , contain Astragalus radix extract Soy extract combination 960:40 one 500 mg tablet . Umooze sell market food . The objective study evaluate benefit Umooze add- therapy BPH , evaluation improvement symptom BPH assess accord International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) Quality- of- Life ( QoL ) index add- therapy Umooze patient BPH . The IPSS validate 7-item urinary symptom severity scale . A randomized , two-regimen , placebo-controlled , parallel- design use study subject receive Umooze placebo . The add- study product administer twice daily 56 day . Benefit evaluate baseline subsequently study day 28 , 42 , 56 , IPSS index , QoL index , Qmax , PVR , prostate volume Prostate-specific antigen ( PSA ) .
DOC.criteria: Males age > =40 year old Screened inquiry diagnose BPH base result digital rectal examination ( DRE ) transrectal ultrasonography ( TRUS ) Prostate volume > = 20 cm3 Has complain void symptom relate BPH Has IPSS > = 13 UFR measure Qmax < = 15 ml/sec together void volume > = 150 ml . Serum PSA < 6.5 ng/ml Has treat medication BPH Informed consent form sign . Sensitivity study product Had receive prostatic surgery BPH past 24 week Hard nodule find DRE Ongoing neurogenic bladder , urinary tract infection , bladder stone , urethral stricture , bladder cancer , prostate cancer , severe liver dysfunction , severe renal dysfunction severe cardiovascular disease . Patient clinically significant physical disability abnormal finding physical examination laboratory test judge investigator co investigator . Participation clinical investigation last 30 day . Individuals judge investigator co investigator undesirable subject .
